Text: Fantasy NBASunday October AM PT Hey reitmeyj Welcome to Yahoo Sports Fantasy NBA This note is to confirm that youve created the team called WXGURU and signed up for one of our Public Leagues where youll compete against other managers whove chosen the same settings as you have You have chosen to participate in an autopick draft Set your draft status to ready by using the change status option found on your Edit Prerankings page all drafts must be conducted by Thursday November Well notify you by email as soon as your team has been selected We have set default player rankings for you but suggest you personalize them to your liking You can begin preranking players as soon as you want to by simply going to the Fantasy NBA home page and clicking on your team name Thanks for joining Good luck Fantasy NBA Commissioner nba
